name: Bloomthis Holdings Pte Ltd
description: Provider of an online subscription based flower delivery platform. The company delivers handcrafted designer flowers, straight from the farms, in a bespoke box on-demand and on a subscription basis, enabling users to regularly send beautiful flowers fresh from the farm.
one_liner: Provider of an online subscription based flower delivery platform. The company delivers handcrafted designer flowers, straight from the farms, in a bespoke box on-demand and on a subscription basis, enabling users to regularly send beautiful flowers fresh from the farm.
